import React from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import products from './' const ProdScreen = (props) => { const product = products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); return (
Back to result
  • {product.name}
  • {product.rating} Stars ({product.numReviews}) Reviews)
  • Price: $ {product.prix}
  • Description:
    {product.description}
  • Price:$$ {product.prix}
  • Status: {product.status}
  • Qty:{" "} {product.prix}
); } export default ProdScreen
